required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Long-term Follow-up Study in Subjects Who Received CTX001
clinical_study.official_title: A Long-term Follow-up Study of Subjects With Î²-thalassemia or Sickle Cell Disease Treated With Autologous CRISPR-Cas9 Modified Hematopoietic Stem Cells (CTX001)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-site, observational study to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of CTX001 in subjects who received CTX001 in Study CTX001-111 (NCT03655678) or Study CTX001-121 (NCT03745287).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Signing of informed consent up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion
Signing of informed consent up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion
Signing of informed consent up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

primary_outcome.measure: Serious adverse events (SAEs) occurring up to 5 years after CTX001 infusion
primary_outcome.time_frame: Signing of informed consent up to 5 years post CTX001 infusion
Signing of informed consent up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion
From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of alleles with intended genetic modification present in peripheral blood leukocytes over time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Transfusion dependent thalassemia (TDT) related transfusions for beta-Thalassemia subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Signing of informed consent up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Iron overload as measured by liver iron concentration (LIC), cardiac iron concentration (CIC), and ferritin for beta-Thalassemia subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 5 years post CTX001 infusion (for LIC and CIC) and up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion (for ferritin)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects receiving iron chelation therapy over time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Annualized rate of severe vaso-occlusive crises (VOC) events for severe sickle cell disease (SCD) subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Sickle cell disease (SCD) related transfusions for SCD subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 15 years post CTX001 infusion

arm_group.description: All subjects who complete or discontinue the parent study (CTX001-111 or CTX001-121) after CTX001 infusion will be asked to participate in this long-term follow-up study.

study_pop.textblock: All subjects who complete or discontinue the parent study (CTX001-111 or CTX001-121) after CTX001 infusion will be enrolled in the long-term follow-up study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects or legal representative or guardian (if applicable) must sign and date informed consent form (ICF)
- Subjects must have received CTX001 infusion
Exclusion Criteria:
- There are no exclusion criteria

facility.name: The Children's Hospital at TriStar Centennial Medical Center/ Sarah Cannon Center for Blood Cancers
Methodist Healthcare System of San Antonio, Methodist Hospital, Methodist Children's Hospital
Regensburg University Hospital, Clinic and Polyclinic for Paediatric and Adolescent Medicine
Dipartimento di Onco-Ematologia e Terapia Cellulare e Genica Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesu - IRCCS

patient_data.ipd_description: Details on Vertex data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.vrtx.com/independent-research/clinical-trial-data-sharing
